tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a severe pain in my left shoulder following a gym injury, I was supposed to go under surgery. But I decided to take another opinion and after seeing reviews called Dr Amit. 
He asked me to come quickly to his clinic. He advised and gave me medications and helped me with the pain. It‚Äôs an ongoing treatment but still I am hopeful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had visited Dr.  Amit with broken shoulder and limited movement in my right hand. Before visiting him  ,  I was treated by so called best doctors and facilities in Australia and had spent  good amount of money on the treatment. But the situation was  not improving  and had limited movement around 15-20 % when I  visited him.  Within 10 days  I got almost all my movement back. I am much better now. The most amazing things about the whole treatment , he never asked me to go for  any Xray , CTScan or MRI.  I find him very honest , sincere ,  no rush attitude, friendly and very helpful.  He helped me with my  neck problem too.  He seems to be very well read and all round abilities  to guide the patient for right treatment. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I sprained my ankle during badminton in UK. After that I started getting numbness in my leg. I could not stand or walk for more than 10 minutes. I was in continous pain. I have consulted many doctors in UK, undergone physio theraphy, acupuncture. But nothing helped. I have specially visited India get my whole body check up. I have consulted couple of doctors there too. Accidently I met Dr. Amit in Gurudwara during his service there.He is the one who gave me hope and diagnosed correct MRI and found the root cause of my pain. I am very  greatful to him. Following his advice and physio theraphy sessions I am feeling much better in long long time. I strongly recommend Dr. Amit for any ortho/spine related issues.  Thank you!
reply_text: Great to learn that you are doing good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My mother had a grade 3 tier and doctor from an another hospital had suggested to go for a surgery. At this age going for a ligament surgery is it self a area of concern. A friend of mine suggested Dr. Amit Kumar Agarwal and we went for a second opinion to him. He explained the problem very peacefully and diagnosed another alignment. He strongly recommend vitamins and take physiotherapy sessions. My mother‚Äôs pain has reduced and she has stared going for walks again.This has been only possible due to the guidance of Dr. Amit. Thank you sir for your help and support.
reply_text: Good to know about the recovery of your mother and thank you for sharing your experience and excellent feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: My mother visited Dr. Agarwal for pain and sourness in her heel. First thing very appreciable and professional about Dr. Agarwal was that he called me much before the appointment time and informed me that he is going to be half an hour late as he is stuck in some medical emergency case and he asked me if that's ok. And when we reached clinic there were already few patients in queue before us but the receptionist informed him about our situation and we were let in earlier than them. So, Dr. Agarwal respects his patient's time which is not the case with many doctors. His check up was also good and he explained the issue also in detail. And another great thing about him is that when I faced cunfusion about his prescribed medicine then I called him which he didn't receive. But just after sometime I got a call back from him and he explained about the medicine very patiently. Very professional and helpful he is. Thank you sir.

tags: None
review: I've been visiting Dr.(Prof) Amit Kumar Agarwal for sometime now regarding my pain issues and my mother's knee problems as well and he has always explained everything properly and treated us very efficiently without prescribing a lot of unnecessary tests or expensive medicines and we have been getting great results. He's a very calm professional punctual and helpful human being exactly like a doctor should be. Highly recommended.
reply_text: Thank you very much for your excellent feedback

review: amit sir is a great guy and a very sincere person. he has a glimpse of a good student still and a curious learner. we are not very eligible to comment or grade somebody since the surgical intervention is highly empirical in nature. i wish he becomes kapil sharma of orthopedics who is actually a ajgar(python) of comedy. kapil sharma kisi ko bhi nigal sakta hai since he is orginal talent and has survival skills of highest order. I wish him to follow footsteps of some  great orthopedics of the world like spine surgeon Dr Todd Albert/ Dr. Robert J. Zehr. ** ** ****** *** **** ***** *** **** ***** *** has a very promising future. wishing him all success and best of treatment to all prospective pateints to whom i can well assure that he will surely surpass your expectations.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
i am Riad Ahmad. From 1 year i am facing left hip joint pain(AVN). After visiting with Dr. Amit Kumar Sir, he advised no need to do total hip replacement. By core decompression surgery+BMAC it's possible to recovery or can delay damage of hip.
Although in previous many doctor's advised to me replace total hip joint.

My surgery done in mid December, now i am feel good. 
As per my experienced Dr. Amit Kumar sir is most experienced, friendly, well behave & responsible doctor. 
Truely speeking i am highly satisfied of his treatment.
reply_text: Thank you for your excellent feedback..wishing you speedy recovery.
